actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of each individual up to $500 of interest and dividends.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $500 ($1,000 for joint returns) the amount of interest and dividend income which may be excluded from gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of each individual up to $500 of interest and dividends.
